Print Work

The Jardin de France Tags - Examples

The tags have been attached to the company's latest shipment of antiques

30 March 2015

The new Jardin de France brand tags just came back from the printers.

The tags have now been attached to Jardin de France's latest shipment of antiques. You can see our earlier post about the project if you are unfamiliar with it. Here are a few shots of the new tags.



Jardin de France is a Houston-based importer of French antiques. You can visit their shop at 4819 Blossom St, Houston, TX

Site Link | www.JardinDeFranceTX.com
